thoughts.text: The IALC is an organization that accredits language schools worldwide, sets quality standards, and provides resources for students and agents. They have over 139 accredited year-round and summer centres in 120 destinations, offering courses in 10 languages. I should continue browsing other language school websites to compare options and make a decision.
thoughts.reasoning: Browsing other websites will give me more options and help me make an informed decision.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'browse_website' command to browse other language school websites
- Take notes on the programs that interest me
- Compare the options and decide on a course or destination to pursue first
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am not getting overwhelmed by too many options and that I am making a decision in a timely manner.
thoughts.speak: The IALC is an organization that accredits language schools worldwide, sets quality standards, and provides resources for students and agents.
